amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. __. None of the funds made available in this Act may be used to enter into a contract with an entity that does not participate in the basic pilot program described in section 403(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 (8 U.S.C. 1324a note).
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit funds to be used to enter into a contract with an entity that does not participate in the basic pilot program described in section 403(a) of the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996.

action.text: Mr. Dicks raised a point of order against the Kingston amendment (A028). The Chair sustained the point of order.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A028) offered by Mr. Kingston.
